creator: lahi.jonty@gmail.com
text: When building Tomcat 8 with ant there is a failure with the library file ecj-4.5.jar that can't read or extract the file. It always download a portion of the file and it is corrupted. The same problem occur when building with a IDE. User want to manually download the file and put the file in the right location to build.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 60067 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: The users list is the place to seek help with your network issues.
